title: canximan
author: canximan
content: Hello everyone. I would like to ask you to join and mine Canxium coin (CAU), this is the beginning of new coin and it'll support offline mining this year.More miners join, more decentralized Canxium will have. CAU can be distributed more and more widely.More information can be found here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5453820.0

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Why do you make coin mining so difficult. First use the Ethash algorithm, then plan to add the SHA256, X11 algorithms. These are algorithms for ASICs and mining on them is unprofitable if the miner has a video card. Then you want to add more algorithms and staking. This does not look like the development of the project, but the addition of mining algorithms.
